resume: Malik, a 35 year old construction worker from Nuuk discovers the love of his life at the time when he is diagnosed with cancer. He faces the choice of staying in Greenland with Nivi, the woman he has come to love − or leaving for Denmark in search of medical treatment.<ref nameSuluk |year4 |publisherChristian |lastAcclaim to film pioneers |pagehttp://www.dfi.dk/English/News/First-feature-from-Greenland.aspx |publisherFirst feature from Greenland |accessdate31 August 2010}}
